def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 3):
        for x,y,z in permutations(config):
            check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
            check_y_large = is_large(y, ctx)
            check_z_large = is_large(z, ctx)
            check_x_middle = is_middle(x, None, ctx)
            check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
            check_y_right_x = is_right(y, x, ctx)
            check_y_lightest = y == lightest([x,y,z], ctx)
            check_z_lowest = z == get_bottom([x,y,z], ctx)
            if (
                check_xyz_close
                and check_x_large
                and check_y_large
                and check_z_large
                and check_x_middle
                and check_x_dark
                and check_y_right_x
                and check_y_lightest
                and check_z_lowest
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([x,y,z]))
    return results
state = turn(state)
